name: United Security Life Insurance & Trust Co. v. Perugini Union Mutual Belief Assn., Appellant
name_abbreviation: United Security Life Insurance & Trust Co. v. Perugini Union Mutual Belief Ass'n

parties: United Security Life Insurance & Trust Co. v. Perugini Union Mutual Belief Assn., Appellant

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Me. Justice Sadlee,
It was stipulated by paper filed that the same judgment should be entered as in the preceding appeal, involving, as it does, the same parties and legal questions.
The judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Me. Justice Sadlee,

casebody.head_matter:
United Security Life Insurance & Trust Co. v. Perugini Union Mutual Belief Assn., Appellant
(No. 2).
April 17, 1922:
